name: littleCity [pre release]
description:
littleCity [pre release]

little city is a small sandbox project i'm working on. feel free to give it a go and take screenshots to show off your ideas [tag me on my Twitter]!

it's very early development and as such may feel very incomplete. i'll try to update regularly with new builds if you want to follow along.

UPDATE: added intersections and water due to popular demand! check controls below. water is experimental.

controls:

b = cycle buildings

e = cycle environment objects [trees, water]

r = cycle road

i = cycle intersections

left mb = place object [can hold down]

right mb = cancel/delete object [can hold down]

q [hold] = query value, mouse over buildings

ctrl + r = restart

ctrl + d = toggle debug text

let me know what you'd like to see added to the game. remember, this isn't supposed to be a SimCity type thing, simply sandbox city builder! querying value is for educational purposes; cancel current build before you can query.

notes: needs a mouse and keyboard. download the .exe version for a more stable experience. f = toggle fullscreen [may only work in windows]. running resolution: 1280 x 720.

thanks for playing!
